countries.name: Japan
countries.description: Experience the perfect blend of ancient traditions and modern innovation in the Land of the Rising Sun.
countries.timeToVisit: Spring (March-May) for cherry blossoms, Fall (September-November) for autumn colors

countries.name: Italy
countries.description: Discover art, history, cuisine, and romance in this Mediterranean paradise.
countries.timeToVisit: Spring (April-June) and Fall (September-October) for pleasant weather

countries.name: Iceland
countries.description: Witness stunning natural phenomena including Northern Lights, geysers, and glaciers.
countries.timeToVisit: Summer (June-August) for midnight sun, Winter (September-March) for Northern Lights

temples.name: Angkor Wat
temples.description: The world's largest religious monument and a stunning example of Khmer architecture.
temples.timeToVisit: November to March for cooler, dry weather
temples.significance: 12th-century temple complex and UNESCO World Heritage Site

temples.name: Borobudur
temples.description: A magnificent 9th-century Mahayana Buddhist temple with intricate stone carvings.
temples.timeToVisit: April to October during dry season
temples.significance: Largest Buddhist temple in the world

temples.name: Taj Mahal
temples.description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum and symbol of eternal love.
temples.timeToVisit: October to March for pleasant weather
temples.significance: Mughal architecture masterpiece and Wonder of the World

beaches.name: Santorini
beaches.description: Famous for its blue-domed churches, stunning sunsets, and volcanic beaches.
beaches.timeToVisit: April to November, peak season June-August

beaches.name: Maldives
beaches.description: Pristine white sand beaches, crystal-clear waters, and luxury overwater bungalows.
beaches.timeToVisit: November to April during dry season

beaches.name: Bora Bora
beaches.description: A tropical paradise with turquoise lagoons and dramatic volcanic peaks.
beaches.timeToVisit: May to October for dry season
